string.value: Juliet's Lunchbox is now complete. It doesn't look all that great, but... seriously, she made this for Romeo, a person she dearly loves, so come on, it can't be toxic, right? Whatever happens to him, I'm sure the great alchemists in Magatia can save him. I'm worried about the lunchbox, but I better still give this to #bRomeo#k.
Romeo seemed very ecstatic to receive the lunchbox. Hopefully he won't die on me.

Here, take a look at this! I made a lunch box for Romeo. It's a combination of omelet and fried rice, and thus, Omelet Rice. I know, this might not be the most exciting lunch menu, but I'm sure Romeo will be more than happy to eat it, right? Please give this to Romeo.
I wonder how Romeo will react to my handmade omelet rice. I can't wait to find out.
Eh? Are you busy? I really would like for you to deliver this to Romeo before it gets cold...

I was wondering why Juliet didn't respond to my letter... instead she was busy making this. I see... a lunch box full of food that Juliet cooked herself. I can't wait to dig in... thank you so much, traveler.
What kind of food would that be? It smells really nice... and I am sure whatever Juliet made, it's going to be great.
You haven't gone to #bRomeo#k yet? Please give this to him before it gets too cold...
Juliet has the letter, right? How come she hasn't responded, then... maybe she didn't like what I wrote on the letter...

I was worried about you losing the lunch box, so I placed a tracing device on it... and sure enough, you did lose it. This lunch box is very special to me, because it's for Romeo... please don't lose it.
